about: Claude Code is an agentic coding tool that lives in your terminal, understands your codebase, and helps you code faster by executing routine tasks, explaining complex code, and handling git workflows - all through natural language commands.

A simple, easy to use PowerShell script to remove pre-installed apps, disable telemetry, as well as perform various other changes to customize, declutter and improve your Windows experience. Win11Debloat works for both Windows 10 and Windows 11.

Scripts to build a trimmed-down Windows 11 image.

Copy, export, import, delete, document and compare policies and profiles in Intune and Azure with PowerShell script and WPF UI. Import ADMX files and registry settings with ADMX ingestion. View and edit PowerShell script.
The Microsoft 365 Agent SDK simplifies building full stack, multichannel, trusted agents for platforms including M365, Teams, Copilot Studio, and Webchat.
.NET news, announcements, release notes, and more!

Personalized Unattended Answer Files that helps automatically debloat and customize Windows 10 & 11 during the installation process.
A collection of software installations scripts for Windows systems that allows you to easily setup and maintain a reverse engineering environment on a VM.
Manages, configures, extracts and monitors Microsoft 365 tenant configurations
